name: Soft-Justice by SIMARL
description: Soft-Justice by SIMARL is a SAAS platform that brings together mediators, arbitrators and legal auxiliaries with legal claimants who want to free themselves from state courts.

sdg: SDG16: Peace¸ Justice and Strong Institutions
sdgs.relevance:
ODD9 SIMARL provides access to justice in any region, whether or not it is included in the judicial map. 
With a simple click, litigants can resolve disputes online, from start to finish.  


ODD16 SIMARL guarantees equal access to justice for all 
SIMARL makes it possible to bring justice closer to everyone, without having to travel to and disgorge in state courts. 
SIMARL is contributing to the development of efficient, accountable and transparent institutions: alternative modes of governance.
